createText: There are two kinds of Slash Commands, global(ğŸŒ) commands and guild(ğŸ ) commands.

Global(ğŸŒ) commands are available for every guild(ğŸ ) that adds your app. Guild(ğŸ ) commands are specific to the guild(ğŸ ) you specify when making them. Command names are unique per application within each scope (global(ğŸŒ) and guild(ğŸ ).
- Your app cannot have two global(ğŸŒ) commands with the same name
- Your app cannot have two guild(ğŸ ) commands within the same name on the same guild(ğŸ )
- Your app can have a global(ğŸŒ) and guild(ğŸ ) command with the same name
- Multiple apps can have commands with the same names
- Apps can have a maximum of 50 global(ğŸŒ) commands, and an additional 50 guild-specific commands per guild(ğŸ )
deleteText: Deletes a command if it exists.
secretText: The secret code is NOT your bot token.
The code was set up when you first created this website. If you lose the code, go to the Vercel website and login to your dashboard. Once you select your project, you can change the code.
You can share your code with your developer team. This allows other developers to manage the commands without having to share a bot's token.
